title: Nunu ult
body: Doesn't it seem kinda weak?  Sure can do "tons of damage" at full charge but how often does that happen?  Too easily interrupted and the cd too long.

replies.body: build kinda tanky ap and get a morgana to shield you, cc? what cc... oh damn you just flashed out of my ult nvm.

you do realise his ult has other applications, such as the Movespeed slow AND the Attack Speed slow. His kit is really well suited as a support for certain ADCs like Kalista, who needs peel and attack speed to work well. That and the Wombo Ulties are all G
is nunu being reworked soon?  cause late game usefullness is just a walking steriod

That why you hide in a bush or something. If you are in a bush and start channeling it your enemy cant see it, they only get effected by the slow but most people arent paying attention.

Its also a zoning tool like Zyra Ult. Its more the threat of ulting then the ult itself that is important.
